documents.document: @GenXpatriate haha! I'm pretty sure my top five includes a <local sports bar>, as well. Cities may change, habits don't.

@BrentNelsen: "Trump's brilliance is that he understands the pain of the working class. His problem: he has no plan to address that pain."
@newsgirlron perception is more important than truth, and fear a stronger motivator than logic. Still, he is one man, and we are a country.
Today, fear trumped reason—but tomorrow is up to us.
@jasonwrichards congrats and thank you for your service to our alma mater, @FurmanU!
If @realDonaldTrump thinks people are #skittles, why can't he taste the rainbow and realize the country isn't just white men?
